EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Follow Up - Database minus Registrants
EmailTemplate.subject: Here's what you missed at Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We recently held our 9th annual enterprise software testing conference, Accelerate 2015, in Vienna, Austria. It was a wonderful day packed with attendees from around the world participating in presentations, workshops, networking, exploring the exhibitions, and taking pictures at the photo booth.
You can catch up on the highlights of Accelerate 2015 by checking out the event photos and videos now up on our website <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/>.
One of the most exciting parts of the day was the official release of Tosca Testsuite 9.0. Click here < http://www.tricentis.com/tricentis-tosca-testsuite/what-is-new/9-0/> to learn more about the new release of Tosca Testsuite and find demos of all the new features.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. We hope to see you at Accelerate 2016!
Best Regards,
The Tricentis Accelerate Team
